subject: Rugby
lead_paragraph: Wasps will face Toulon, Leinster and Bath in what looks like the “Pool of Death” of this year’s tournament, with Toulon and Leinster winning six of the last seven championships.
snippet: Wasps will face Toulon, Leinster and Bath in what looks like the “Pool of Death” of this year’s tournament, with Toulon and Leinster winning six of the last seven championships.
